faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions
faq.noResults: No questions found matching your search

q1.question: How do I book a property?
q1.answer: Simply search for your destination, select your dates and guests, browse available properties, and click 'Book Now' or 'Request to Book'. Follow the checkout process to complete your reservation.

q2.question: Is my payment secure?
q2.answer: Yes, all payments are processed through secure, encrypted channels. We support various payment methods including credit cards, Mada, and Apple Pay.

q3.question: What is the cancellation policy?
q3.answer: Each property has its own cancellation policy set by the host. You can find this information on the property listing page before booking.

q4.question: How do I contact the host?
q4.answer: Once your booking is confirmed, you can message the host directly through our messaging system to coordinate check-in details.

q5.question: What if there's an issue during my stay?
q5.answer: Our 24/7 customer support team is available to help resolve any issues. You can reach us through the app or by calling our support line.

q6.question: Are the properties family-friendly?
q6.answer: Many properties are family-friendly. Look for the 'Family Only' badge or check the property's house rules to ensure it meets your needs.

q1.question: How do I list my property?
q1.answer: Create a host account, click 'Add New Listing', and follow the step-by-step process to add your property details, photos, pricing, and house rules.

q2.question: How much does it cost to list?
q2.answer: Listing your property is free. We only charge a service fee when you receive a booking, which is deducted from the payout.

q3.question: How do I get paid?
q3.answer: Payments are transferred to your bank account within 24 hours after guest check-out. You can set up your payout preferences in your account settings.

q4.question: Can I set my own house rules?
q4.answer: Yes, you have full control over your house rules, including check-in/out times, guest policies, and whether to allow pets or smoking.

q5.question: How do I become a Superhost?
q5.answer: Superhosts are experienced hosts who provide exceptional hospitality. Maintain a high rating, respond quickly to messages, and avoid cancellations to qualify.

q1.question: What payment methods are accepted?
q1.answer: We accept Visa, Mastercard, Mada, Apple Pay, and various local payment methods. Some properties also offer pay-later options through Tabby or Tamara.

q2.question: When am I charged?
q2.answer: For instant bookings, you're charged immediately upon confirmation. For request-to-book properties, you're charged once the host accepts your request.

q3.question: How do refunds work?
q3.answer: Refunds are processed according to the property's cancellation policy. Once approved, refunds typically take 5-10 business days to appear in your account.

q4.question: Is there a security deposit?
q4.answer: Some hosts require a security deposit. This will be clearly shown before you book. Deposits are refunded after check-out if there's no damage.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Please read these terms carefully before using StayGCC.
terms.contact: If you have questions, contact us at legal@staygcc.com

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using StayGCC, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.

eligibility.title: Eligibility
eligibility.content: You must be at least 18 years old to use StayGCC. By using our services, you represent that you meet this requirement.

account.title: Account Registration
account.content: You must provide accurate information when creating an account. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account credentials.

booking.title: Booking and Payments
booking.content: When you book a property, you agree to pay all charges including the nightly rate, fees, and applicable taxes. Payments are processed securely through our platform.

cancellation.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellation.content: Cancellation policies vary by property. Please review the specific cancellation policy before booking. Refunds are processed according to the applicable policy.

guestResponsibilities.title: Guest Responsibilities
guestResponsibilities.content: Guests must respect the property and follow all house rules. You are responsible for any damage caused during your stay.

hostResponsibilities.title: Host Responsibilities
hostResponsibilities.content: Hosts must provide accurate listing information and maintain their property in a safe, clean condition. Hosts must honor confirmed bookings.

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.content: All payments are processed in the currency displayed at booking. Exchange rates may apply for international transactions.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: StayGCC serves as a platform connecting guests and hosts. We are not responsible for the actions of users or the condition of properties.

disputes.title: Dispute Resolution
disputes.content: In case of disputes, we encourage users to communicate directly. Our support team can help mediate if needed.

modifications.title: Modifications
modifications.content: We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use of StayGCC after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These terms are governed by the laws of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of Riyadh.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how StayGCC collects, uses, and protects your personal information.
privacy.contact: For privacy-related inquiries, contact us at privacy@staygcc.com

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly, such as name, email, phone number, and payment details. We also collect usage data and device information automatically.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use your information to provide our services, process bookings, communicate with you, and improve our platform. We may also use it for marketing with your consent.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We share information with hosts/guests as needed for bookings, with service providers who assist our operations, and when required by law.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data, including encryption and secure servers.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience and analyze usage. You can manage cookie preferences in your browser settings.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. You can also opt out of marketing communications at any time.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your data as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services. We may retain certain information as required by law.

international.title: International Transfers
international.content: Your data may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not intended for children under 18. We do not knowingly collect information from children.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes through the app or email.
